amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out the NATO Security Investment Program and apply the savings of $199.7 million to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: To reduce the Military Construction Authorization funds to $0, and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
